Package projetjeu.patterns

Class GridProxy

java.lang.Object
projetjeu.patterns.GridProxy
All Implemented Interfaces:
Grid
public class GridProxy extends Object implements Grid
Proxy of PrincipalGrid allowing a separate view for each player

    • getTileAt

      public Clonable getTileAt(int x, int y)
      Modified getter of the tile with the coordinates in argument, can change the tile's content if the player is not supposed to see it.
      Specified by:
      getTileAt in interface Grid
      Parameters:
      x - Square ordinate.
      y - Square abscissa.
      Returns:
      The tile's content of the player is allowed to see it, otherwise an empty tile.

    • toString

      public String toString()
      Provides a string representing what the proxy client is allowed to see.
      Specified by:
      toString in interface Grid
      Overrides:
      toString in class Object
      Returns:

    • toStringForThread

      public String toStringForThread()
      Alternate display method used in PrintThread. This method makes the active player blink when a human is playing.
      Returns:
      two strings alternating to crate a blinking animation in command prompt.
